name: Daily Meal
description: Daily meal plan can be for both lunch and dinner. You can choose your meal from the menu or can order customise meal plan according to your diet.

name: Event
description: You can choose from the various event menus.Arrangement can be made for upto 80 people. Perfect for small house events.

name: Corporate
description: You can arrange meals plans on a daily, weekly, custom basis.  Meal plan and menu can be customized accourding to your interest.

name: Dessert
description: You can now order our delicious desserts from our website. Sweet, creamy treat to fullfill your dessert dream. menue can be customised.
